originalText.text: I could not say enough about the services provided.  The entire team is efficient and always over deliver.  I continue to be amazed by how well they manage daily operations and ensure your business stays current. They are great for project management, marketing, and scaling.  The delivery is major organization but the interaction is more personal. They talk to you like family and not just another client.

originalText.text: I would highly recommend working with the team at Metatron Concepts.  I hired Onyx and his team to help me with my social media presence which included regular Linked In posts/articles.  They also built a specific project and marketing campaign for me which included targeted emails to key decision makers.  Onyx is a joy to work with, is very responsive and provided me with the tools I needed to make my business top of mind.  I know that I only scratched the surface with Metatron Concepts.  I have no doubt their team will help your business grow.

originalText.text: Great Team. Helped design my website and provided the tools to manage my growing business successfully.  Thanks again Onyx and Team.

originalText.text: Metatron Concepts provides a free personal training app that I have been using called PTN. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and can already tell the amazing difference it has made! I like that it pushes me in terms of both strength and speed. The results are very visible! I couldn’t be happier with the app!
